definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: To compare with the side effect of the Chinese medicine-"Choudongling Granule" and that of western medicine - Tiapride.
sentences.chinese: 中藥抽動停沖劑與西藥硫酸泰必利副作用的比較。

sentences.english: The vast majority of western medicine is down in this bottom left hand corner.
sentences.chinese: 大量的西藥都在置於手邊左下角。

sentences.english: Does Oriental medicine work well along with Western medicine?
sentences.chinese: 東方醫學的工作是否也隨着西藥？

sentences.english: Combination of modem and traditional medicines may be the most prospective way.
sentences.chinese: 抗乙肝病毒的前景可能在中西藥的聯合應用上。

sentences.english: My hayfever is under control without over the counter medicines.
sentences.chinese: 我的花粉熱在沒有用西藥的情況下得到控制。

sentences.english: The drug-used of Chinese herbals &medicines by senior patients in different genders is mainly for cardiovascular.
sentences.chinese: 不同性別老年患者的中西藥用藥均以心血管類爲主。

sentences.english: The application of Western and Chinese medicines constitute an integral part of health care.
sentences.chinese: 中西藥的應用，是健康護理不可或缺的一環。

sentences.english: Conclusion The curative effect of nape multiple acupuncture plus surrounding acupuncture is better than that of Western medicine on migraine.
sentences.chinese: 結論項叢刺合圍針治療偏頭痛療效優於西藥治療。

sentences.english: But to oppose the addition of Western-made traditional Chinese medicine capsules.
sentences.chinese: 但是要反對在自制中藥膠囊中加入西藥。

sentences.english: To observe the influence of acupuncture and western medicine on benzene induced leukopenia .
sentences.chinese: 觀察針刺和西藥對苯引起白細胞減少症的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the reasons for outpatient pharmacy drug withdrawal, and explore measures to reduce drug withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析門診西藥房退藥原因，探索減少退藥的措施。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Treament of heavy type hepatitis with the artificial liver technique and combination of TCM and WM has a better curative effect than single WM.
sentences.chinese: 結論中西藥聯合人工肝技術治療重型肝炎療效可靠。

sentences.english: May be I missed, I have never seen any such program for problems of western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 我可能漏看，我從來未看過有關西藥的問題。

sentences.english: The western medicine set takes orally the western medicine Methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 西藥組口服西藥彌可保。

sentences.english: The western medicine set takes orally the western medicine Methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 西藥組口服西藥彌可保。

sentences.english: Pharmaceutical freeze-drying comprises two portions of Western medicine and traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 藥品冷凍乾燥包括西藥和中藥兩部分。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
